cleaned_text: Pest Control Supplies Shop Online If you are up for a DIY pest control project, Solutions Pest Control has some pest control products that can help! We have selected safe and effective pest control products you can use around your home or office. Place your order and we will ship the products right to your address. Our products are categorized by the type of pest you are dealing with. Click on a specific category to see the products available to help you deal with your specific pest. Feel free to look through the [Pest Information pages](https://www.pestsolutions.ca/pest-information/), they may help you understand the characteristics of the pest you are dealing with. You may find our [Bug Blog posts](https://www.pestsolutions.ca/bug-blog/) handy. There is a great deal of information in our Bug Blog posts, perhaps one will address the pest issues you are experiencing today. Our posts are organized by pest category, you can click on the pest you want to research in the category list in
